resources:
SPEECH <--> Starting custom routine. Beep boop. I will start my patrol. I will wait here for int seconds <--> seconds. Please take a moment to clean your hands.
Hello, I am low on battery. Press the button on the screen if you want me to start patrolling when I\'ve finished charging. Hello, I am low on battery and also am not connected to a charging source. Please send me back to the home base so I can charge myself. I can do this automatically if you press the button on the screen.
Excuse me
Pardon
Pardon me
Beep beep coming through
Coming through
On my way
TEXT <--> Take a moment to clean your hands
Going to the next waypoint…
Waiting… Turn ON Patrol Auto-Start Turn OFF Patrol Auto-Start Charging | Auto-start mode: on Charging | Auto-start mode: off Tap to send me back to the home base Force Start Patrol Now Charging | Tap to force start patrol now.\nAuto-start: Ready to start patrol
Returning to Home Base I am going back to the home base to charge. Completed all patrol loops. I will now return to the home base.
